content.body: littledan: I paged most of the scoping discussion we had out again, but I was wondering if https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/8476 and https://github.com/fserb/canvas2D/blob/master/spec/layers.md are something it could help with. In particular giving you syntax for exiting the scope that would then result in `endLayer()` getting invoked. (As well as allow for nesting of scopes.)
